title: Billy Madison
short_plot_summary: A wealthy, immature man is forced to go back through grades 1-12 to inherit his father's hotel empire and prove himself worthy.
explanation: A beer, representing Billy's irresponsible lifestyle that prevents his father from trusting him to run the hotel
A penguin, the one Billy hallucinates, citing it's too hot for them to just be walking around here
A female teacher, representing Veronica Vaughn, who helps Billy throughout his journey
A clown, I bet you thought that he was dead, but when he fell over he just broke his leg and got a hemorrhage in his head
A trophy, symbolizing Billy's victory in the Academic Decathlon, proving his worthiness to inherit his father's hotel empire
